text: Bertram Neville Brockhouse, (July 15, 1918 - October 13, 2003) was a Canadian physicist. He was awarded the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1994, shared with Clifford Shull for the development of neutron scattering and neutron spectroscopy.science.ca profile of Bertram Brockhouse ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Canadian physicists Category:People from Alberta
title: Bertram Brockhouse
